_IP_ADDR Union Reference

#include <ip.h>


Data Fields

BYTE v [4]
DWORD Val

Detailed Description

Structure to store an IP address. For example, if IP address is "192.168.1.0", then:
  • IP_ADDR.v[0] = 192
  • IP_ADDR.v[1] = 168
  • IP_ADDR.v[2] = 1
  • IP_ADDR.v[3] = 10

Field Documentation

BYTE _IP_ADDR::v[4]

Examples:
ex_tcp_client.c, ex_tcp_sendfile.c, ex_udp_client.c, and ex_udp_client2.c.

DWORD _IP_ADDR::Val
